name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】魔法少女ホロウィッチ！THE STAGE【#ホロウィッチ】 [WV2_cgUA8cc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Sweet Magic' by Sakura Miko, Himemori Luna, and Murasaki Shion.
MC section where Team Astra (Sakamata Chloe, Houshou Marine, and Murasaki Shion) appears and prepares for their performance.
Performance of the song 'Betelgeuse' by Team Astra.

subtitles.original: 苦味も...
subtitles.english: Even the bitterness...

subtitles.original: チョコレートケーキ...
subtitles.english: Is like a chocolate cake...

subtitles.original: 魔法をかけた
subtitles.english: Casting magic on it...

subtitles.original: 甘い奇跡
subtitles.english: To create a sweet miracle!

subtitles.original: 甘さは抑えてみたのとか
subtitles.english: Maybe I tried to hold back on the sweetness?

subtitles.original: ミルクなしのコーヒーとか
subtitles.english: Like coffee without any milk?

subtitles.original: 甘いだけじゃ大人になれないの？
subtitles.english: Can't I become an adult just by being sweet?

subtitles.original: そんなの絶対絶対ヤダヤダヤダ
subtitles.english: I absolutely, absolutely don't want that!

subtitles.original: ねえ あげようか
subtitles.english: Hey, shall I give it to you?

subtitles.original: 甘い罠
subtitles.english: This sweet trap.

subtitles.original: ほら 虜にしてあげる
subtitles.english: Look, I'll make you fall for me.

subtitles.original: そんな魔法かけるから
subtitles.english: Since I'm casting that kind of magic...

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけ待たせてあげるわ
subtitles.english: I'll make you wait just a little bit.

subtitles.original: 尊と一口が足りなくて
subtitles.english: Just a single bite wasn't enough.

subtitles.original: 赤いちごみたく意地張って
subtitles.english: Being stubborn like a red strawberry...

subtitles.original: 甘いところなんて見せないわ
subtitles.english: I won't show you my sweet side.

subtitles.original: 完璧に作る魔法 独り占めで もうもうもう
subtitles.english: Keeping this perfect magic all to myself, oh!

subtitles.original: ねえ 気づいてるでしょ？
subtitles.english: Hey, you've noticed, haven't you?

subtitles.original: 分かってるでしょ？
subtitles.english: You know it, don't you?

subtitles.original: 隠し味の恋心
subtitles.english: The secret ingredient is my love.

subtitles.original: 苦味とか
subtitles.english: Whether it's bitterness...

subtitles.original: 酸味とか
subtitles.english: Or whether it's sourness...

subtitles.original: そういうのもたまにはいいわ
subtitles.english: Those are fine once in a while.

subtitles.original: 意地っ張りで
subtitles.english: Stubborn...

subtitles.original: 我儘な
subtitles.english: And selfish...

subtitles.original: そんな甘い魔法使い
subtitles.english: That's the kind of sweet magic user I am.

subtitles.original: チームラスタ、素敵な魔法をありがとう！
subtitles.english: Team Lasta, thank you for the wonderful magic!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ良かったじゃん。こっちも頑張らないとな。
subtitles.english: That was really good. We have to do our best too.

subtitles.original: せっかくだし、次はちょっと雰囲気変えてみない？
subtitles.english: Since we're here, why don't we change the mood a bit?

subtitles.original: いいですね！じゃあ...
subtitles.english: Sounds good! Well then...

subtitles.original: せーの！ホロウィッチ！チームアストラ！フルキャスト！
subtitles.english: Ready, go! Holowitch! Team Astra! Full Cast!

subtitles.original: 空にある何かを見つめてたら
subtitles.english: As I gazed at something in the sky...

subtitles.original: それは星だって君が教えてくれた
subtitles.english: You told me that it was a star.

subtitles.original: まるでそれは僕らみたいに寄り添ってる
subtitles.english: It's as if it's snuggling up, just like us.

subtitles.original: それを泣いたり笑ったり繋いでゆく
subtitles.english: Connecting those moments of laughter and tears.

subtitles.original: 何十回 何百回 ぶつかりあって
subtitles.english: Colliding tens, hundreds of times...

subtitles.original: 何十年 何百年 昔の光が
subtitles.english: Light from tens, hundreds of years ago...

subtitles.original: 星自身も忘れた頃に僕らに届いてる
subtitles.english: Reaches us even after the star itself has forgotten.

subtitles.original: 僕ら付き合って 手繰りあって 同じ空
subtitles.english: We're together, pulling each other along under the same sky.

subtitles.original: 輝くのだって 二人だって 約束した
subtitles.english: We promised each other that we'd shine together.

subtitles.original: 遥か遠く終わらないベテルギウス
subtitles.english: A distant, never-ending Betelgeuse.

subtitles.original: 誰かに繋ぐ魔法
subtitles.english: Magic that connects to someone.

subtitles.original: 僕ら肩並べて 取り合って 進んでく
subtitles.english: Standing side-by-side, holding hands, we move forward.

subtitles.original: 辛い時だって 泣かないって 誓ったはず
subtitles.english: We should have sworn not to cry, even in hard times.

subtitles.original: 遥か遠く終わらないベテルギウス
subtitles.english: A distant, never-ending Betelgeuse.

subtitles.original: 君にも見えるだろう
subtitles.english: You can see it too, right?

subtitles.original: 祈りが
subtitles.english: Our prayer.

subtitles.original: 記憶を辿るたび 蘇るよ
subtitles.english: It all comes back whenever I trace my memories.

subtitles.original: 君がいつだって そこにいてくれること
subtitles.english: The fact that you're always there for me.

subtitles.original: まるでそれは星の光
subtitles.english: It's just like the light of a star.
